query: Primitive Button component with variants (default, outline, ghost) and sizes, styled with TailwindCSS and Radix UI
Primitive Input component with styled label, placeholder, and error state, using TailwindCSS and Radix UI
Primitive Textarea component with styled label and error state
Primitive Card component for containing content, with image and footer slot
Primitive Dialog component for modals with title, description, and actions
Primitive Tabs component for tabbed content navigation
Primitive Accordion component for collapsible panels
Primitive Popover component for small overlays
Primitive Badge component for status or rarity labels
Primitive Avatar component for displaying user or pet images
Primitive Switch component for toggles (e.g., dark mode)
Primitive Tooltip component for hover-over information
Primitive Progress component for displaying progress bars
Primitive Slider component for adjustable range input
Responsive Navbar component with logo, navigation links, and wallet connect button, sticky and mobile-friendly
Footer component with copyright notice and footer links, styled for dark and light modes
Hero section component with prominent title, subtitle, call-to-action button, and background gradient
Token information card component displaying token name, symbol, total supply, and user balance
Approve token form component with styled input fields and submit button
Transfer token form component with styled input fields, submit button, and validation states
Pet card component showing pet image, name, rarity badge, stats overview, and action buttons
Pet gallery grid component to display a list of pet cards responsively
Breeding dialog component with form controls to select parent pets and initiate breeding
Marketplace item card component for pets and items with price tag, buy button, and status badge
Auction listing component with countdown timer, current bid display, and bid action button
Leaderboard table component displaying user rankings, avatars, and statistics
Live chat panel component with message list, message input box, and send button
Daily rewards panel component showing login streak, reward details, and claim button
Crop farming panel component displaying virtual crops, growth progress bars, and harvest action
Battle arena component showing pet battle interface, participants, actions, and reward summary
Dashboard stats overview component showing key metrics in icon cards
Error fallback component for displaying error messages with retry action
Loading skeleton component for placeholder loading states across the app
Toast notification provider component for transient success, error, and info messages with animations
